::Firearm::

Firearm's scanners shriek at him with proximity alerts as missiles stream 
toward him, the bot transforming back into robot mode, instantly regretting 
it as explosions behind him send dirt and rocks hitting his damaged back. The 
Maximal growls. He was is very bad condition, they had to get out of here 
soon.

"Let's go!" he yells at Triceradon, firing a pistol at Injector.
